def_cn: 紧急事件;意外事件;（尤指）事故
def_en: An emergency is an unexpected and difficult or dangerous situation, especially an accident, which happens suddenly and which requires quick action to deal with it.
An emergency action is one that is done or arranged quickly and not in the normal way, because an emergency has occurred.

def_cn: （设备、供应品等）救急用的，应急的
def_en: Emergency equipment or supplies are those intended for use in an emergency.
